yourReference.title: What is your unique reference for this Annex VII record?
yourReference.intro: Your unique reference can be anything that helps you to identify your shipment. For example, it could match a reference on a system you already use to identify shipments.
yourReference.intro.second.paragraph: Your unique reference can only have numbers and letters and should be a maximum of 20 characters. For example, ABC10001.

exportJourney.quantity.entry.bulk.warnin: You'll need to update this with actual details as soon as possible after submitting this export.
exportJourney.quantity.intro: This does not include the weight of the container or vehicle. If the weight might change, enter an estimate.
exportJourney.quantity.radioYes: Yes, I know the actual amount
exportJourney.quantity.radioEstimate: No, I will enter an estimate
exportJourney.quantity.radioNo: No, I do not know the amount yet
exportJourney.quantityValue.Actual.title: What is the actual weight of waste?
exportJourney.quantityValue.Estimate.tit: What is the estimated weight of waste?
exportJourney.quantityValue.intro: Do not include the weight of the container or vehicle.
exportJourney.quantityValue.inputHint: Enter up to two decimal places, for example 5.25
What is the actual net weight of the waste?
exportJourney.quantityValueSmall.Estimat: What is the estimated net weight of the waste?
This must be 25kg or under. Do not include the weight of the container or vehicle. If the weight might change,
exportJourney.quantityValueSmall.Estimat: This must be 25kg or under. Do not include the weight of the container or vehicle.

exportJourney.wasteCollection.CountrySta: From your selected address we'll use
exportJourney.wasteCollectionDate.title: Do you know when the waste will be collected?
exportJourney.wasteCollectionDate.intro: The collection date must be in the future.
exportJourney.wasteCollectionDate.radioY: If the date might change, enter an estimate instead.
exportJourney.wasteCollectionDate.radioN: No, I’ll enter an estimate date
You must update this with actual details as soon as possible after submitting this record.
exportJourney.wasteCarrierDetails.title: Waste carriers
exportJourney.wasteCarrierDetails.contac: What are the {{n}} waste carrier's contact details?
exportJourney.wasteCarrierTransport.page: How will the {{carrierIndex}} waste carrier transport the waste?
exportJourney.wasteCarrierTransport.desc: What are the {{carrierIndex}} waste carrier's {{type}} transportation details?
You can add any details you have about the means of transport, for example any:
exportJourney.wasteCarrierTransport.Road: container numbers *trailer numbers *vehicle registrations *information about specialist containers being transported
exportJourney.wasteCarrierTransport.SeaB: container numbers *vessel names *call signs *information about specialist containers being transported *International Maritime Organisation (IMO numbers)
exportJourney.wasteCarrierTransport.AirB: package numbers *bulk vessels *flight numbers *information about specialist containers being transported
exportJourney.wasteCarrierTransport.Rail: shipping container numbers *freight numbers *information about specialist containers being transported
exportJourney.wasteCarrierTransport.Inla: shipping container numbers *vessel names *call signs *information about specialist containers being transported *International Maritime Organisation (IMO numbers)
Do you need to add another waste carrier?
You can add up to {{n}} more.
You have added the maximum number of waste carriers.
Are you sure you want to remove this waste carrier?
exportJourney.wasteCollectionDetails.int: This could be from the waste generator, original producer, new producer or collector.
exportJourney.wasteCollectionDetails.con: Where will the first waste carrier collect the waste from?
exportJourney.wasteCollectionDetails.cou: We'll use this as the exporting country
exportJourney.wasteTransitCountries.titl: Are there any other countries the waste will travel through?
exportJourney.wasteTransitCountries.hint: This will be the first country the waste will travel through. Do not include the exporting or importing country.
exportJourney.wasteTransitCountries.addi: Do you need to add another country?
You must add countries in order of travel
Do not include the exporting or importing country
exportJourney.wasteTransitCountries.chan: What would you like to change {{country}} to?
exportJourney.wasteTransitCountries.conf: Are you sure you want to remove {{country}}?

exportJourney.pointOfExit.intro: For example, the nearest town, port or terminal.
exportJourney.recoveryFacilities.caption: Recovery facility details
exportJourney.recoveryFacilities.country: We'll use this as the importing country. This cannot be the UK.

exportJourney.recoveryFacilities.name: Facility name

exportJourney.interimSite.addressTitle: What is the interim site’s address?
exportJourney.interimSite.name: Interim site name
exportJourney.interimSite.contactTitle: What are the interim site’s contact details?
exportJourney.interimSite.confirmTitle: Will the waste go to an interim site before it reaches the final recovery facility?
exportJourney.interimSite.confirmHint: This includes for storage or processing.
exportJourney.interimSite.details: An interim site is an authorised facility where the waste gets limited additional processing. For example, at an interim site different plastic waste grades could be separated or stored temporarily before they move to one or more final recovery facilities.
exportJourney.laboratorySite.caption: Laboratory details
exportJourney.laboratorySite.name: Laboratory name
exportJourney.laboratorySite.contactTitl: What are the laboratory contact details?

exportJourney.checkAnswers.heading: Check your answers before submitting this record
exportJourney.checkAnswers.paragraph: Changing an answer could affect other responses you’ve given. Check your responses to make sure they’re still correct
exportJourney.checkAnswers.warning: You'll need to update any estimated details with actual details as soon as possible after submitting this record.
exportJourney.checkAnswers.changeWasteCo: You are changing your waste code
You are changing your waste code
If you need to change your waste code, this may affect other answers in this record that you may also need to update.
exportJourney.checkAnswers.signDeclarati: By submitting this record, you agree that the information you have provided is accurate. You are confirming that:
all the information you've provided is complete and correct to the best of your knowledge
there is an effective written contractual obligation with the consignee
you've checked with the relevant authorities if there are any local controls that apply in any country involved in the journey of the waste

cookie.banner.title: Cookies on Export waste from the UK
cookie.banner.p1: We use some essential cookies to make this service work.
cookie.banner.p2: We’d also like to use analytics cookies so we can understand how you use the service and make improvements.
cookie.banner.confirmation_accepted: You have accepted analytics cookies. You can <2>change your cookie settings</2> at any time.
cookie.banner.confirmation_rejected: You have rejected analytics cookies. You can <2>change your cookie settings</2> at any time.
cookie.page.title: Cookies
cookie.page.saved.link: Go back to the page you were looking at.
cookie.page.p1: Cookies are small files save on your phone, tablet or computer when you visit a website.
cookie.page.p2: We use cookies to make this site work and collect information about how you use our service.
cookie.page.p3: Essential cookies keep your information secure whilst you use this service. We do not need to ask permission to use them.
cookie.page.analytics.heading: Do you want to accept analytics cookies?
multiples.guidance.heading: Creating multiple Annex VII records
multiples.guidance.listHeading: How to create and upload your file
multiples.guidance.listItemOne.link: how to create multiple Annex VII records using the CSV template (opens in new tab)
multiples.guidance.listItemOne.end: to help you create your file.
multiples.guidance.listItemTwo.link: multiple Annex VII record CSV template
multiples.guidance.listItemTwo.end: and open it using spreadsheet software. For example, Excel, Numbers, OpenOffice Calc or Google Sheets.
multiples.guidance.listItemThree: Enter all the required information into the template.
multiples.guidance.listItemFour: Save the file in CSV format.
multiples.guidance.document.html.link: How to create multiple Annex VII records using the CSV template (opens in new tab)
multiples.guidance.document.csv.heading: Multiple Annex VII CSV template
multiples.guidance.document.csv.sub: This file may not be suitable for users of assistive technology.
multiples.guidance.document.csv.link: Download the multiple Annex VII record CSV template (3Kb)
multiples.guidance.upload.heading: Upload your CSV file
multiples.guidance.upload.sub: You need to check for errors before uploading.
multiples.guidance.page.title: Export green list waste: how to submit multiple exports from a CSV file
multiples.guidance.bouncePage.title: Use the guidance to create multiple Annex VII records from the template
multiples.guidance.bouncePage.firstParag: When you enter your Annex VII recored information into the template, you need to save it as a CSV file. This is where data is separated by commas rather than columns. If you change the structure of the template, your upload may fail.
multiples.guidance.bouncePage.secondPara: It is important you use the guidance to help you fill in and upload the template correctly.
multiples.errorSummaryPage.heading: Correct errors and upload the amended file
multiples.errorSummaryPage.importantMess: You need to correct the error before you can submit all your Annex VII records
You need to correct {{count}} errors before you can submit all your Annex VII records
multiples.errorSummaryPage.leadParagraph: You need to correct all errors in your file and upload it again. This will replace your previous upload.
multiples.errorSummaryPage.linkGuidanceT: how to create multiple Annex VII records using the CSV template (opens in new tab)
multiples.errorSummaryPage.linkParagraph: to understand how to fill it in.
These are formatting errors that the system has identified. It cannot check for factual errors you might make when entering any details.
You can upload your amended file after correcting any errors a row at a time, or you can correct all errors in the whole file and upload it at the end.
multiples.errorSummaryPage.errorList.row: Check the list below for the error descriptions before correcting these errors in your file.
multiples.errorSummaryPage.errorListTabl: Go back to error summary table
multiples.errorSummaryPage.submit.warnin: You'll need to update any estimated details in your records with actual details as soon as possible after submitting.
multiples.errorSummaryPage.submit.list.h: By submitting these Annex VII records, you confirm that:
multiples.errorSummaryPage.submit.list.i: all information you've provided is complete and correct to the best of your knowledge
there are effective written contractual obligations with the consignees
you've checked with the relevant authorities if there are any local controls that apply in any country involved in the journey of the waste
multiples.submit.heading: Submit all {{count}} Annex VII records
multiples.submit.warning: You'll need to update any estimated details in your records with actual details as soon as possible after submitting.
multiples.submit.list.heading: By submitting these Annex VII records, you confirm that:
multiples.submit.list.itemOne: all information you've provided is complete and correct to the best of your knowledge
multiples.submit.list.itemTwo: there are effective written contractual obligations with the consignees
multiples.submit.list.itemThree: you've checked with the relevant authorities if there are any local controls that apply in any country involved in the journey of the waste
multiples.success.heading_one: You have no errors in your {{count}} Annex VII record and you can submit it.
multiples.success.heading_other: You have no errors in your {{count}} Annex VII records and you can submit them all.
multiples.success.heading.afterCorrectio: You have corrected all your errors and can submit {{count}} Annex VII record.
You have corrected all your errors and can submit {{count}} Annex VII records.
multiples.success.intro: If you cancel submitting these records now, you will have to upload the CSV file again.
multiples.cancel.title: You have not submitted your Annex VII records yet
multiples.cancel.intro: If you cancel submitting these records now, you will have to upload the CSV file again.
multiples.confirmation.title: {{ count }} Annex VII record{{ plural }} submitted
multiples.confirmation.detailsLink: View Annex VII record details for this transaction (opens in new tab)
multiples.confirmation.stepsPrompt: Now you have completed the forms, you need to:
multiples.confirmation.stepOne: make a note of all transaction numbers
multiples.confirmation.stepTwo: send these details to any relevant UK regulatory authorities (if this applies to the nation you are exporting the waste from)
multiples.confirmation.stepThree: send relevant completed Annex VII records with the waste
multiples.confirmation.estimatesPrompt: If you've provided any estimates, you'll need to provide actual details as soon as possible. This includes the:
multiples.confirmation.legalStatementp1: It is a legal requirement that completed Annex VII records travel with the waste. You can use your own or
multiples.confirmation.legalStatementp2: Any estimated details you have entered will not appear on the downloaded records.
multiples.confirmation.legalStatementLin: download all the Annex VII records created from this export (PDF, {{ count }} pages).
multiples.confirmation.returnButton: Return to export waste from the UK

validation.reference.charTooFew: Enter a reference using more than 1 character

validation.nationalCode.charTooMany: Enter a code using 50 character or less
validation.nationalCode.charInvalid: The code must only include letters a to z, numbers, spaces, hyphens and back slashes
validation.description.tooLong: Description must be 100 characters or less
validation.quantity.amount.actual: Enter the actual net weight or volume of waste
validation.quantity.amount.estimate: Enter the estimated net weight or volume of waste
validation.quantity.value.numbers: Enter {{label}} using only numbers and a full stop
validation.quantity.value.invalid: The {{label}} needs to be greater than 0
validation.date.collection.select: Select yes if you know when the waste will be collected
validation.date.invalid.past: Enter a date in the future
validation.date.invalid.working.days: Enter a date at least 3 business days in the future
validation.exit.select: Select yes if you know where the waste will leave the UK
validation.location.charTooMany: Enter the location using 50 character or less
validation.location.charInvalid: The location must only include letters a to z, and special characters such as full stops, hyphens, spaces and apostrophes
validation.transport.select: Select how the {{carrierNumber}} waste carrier will transport the waste
validation.transport.description: The {{carrierNumber}} carrier's {{type}} transportation details must be 200 characters or less
validation.transit.countries.select: Select yes if there are any other countries the waste will travel through
validation.transit.country.hasDuplicates: You have already entered this country
validation.transit.country.sameAsImporte: The transit country cannot be the same as the importer country
validation.importer.country.sameAsTransi: The importer country cannot be the same as the transit country

validation.remove.carrier: Select yes if you want to remove this carrier
validation.remove.document: Select yes if you want to remove this document
validation.remove.document.reason: Select a reason if you want to cancel this document
validation.cancel.reason.invalid: Reason must be 100 characters or less
validation.recovery.facility.name: Enter the recovery facility name
validation.recovery.facility.another: Select yes if you want to add another facility
validation.template.name: The template name must only include letters a to z, numbers, spaces, hyphens, brackets, apostrophes and back slashes
validation.template.description: Description must be 100 characters or less
